name: The Escape (itch) (LeBanc)
description:
You were at the wrong time at the wrong place and your only way to freedom is to find the car that belongs to the key you found.

But you are not alone is the parking lot!
The Escape is a Tactical turn-based game made for Global Game Jam 2021 where you have to stay quiet while finding the car that will allow you to escape.

The game is playable with the mouse.

I hope there are not to many remaining bugs and that you will enjoy this creation of mine.
